name: HoloFuel
description: Simple and intuitive interface allowing users to transact with HoloFuel.

scripts.start-dna-agent2: cd ./holofuel && HC_N3H_PATH=~/src/n3h HC_AGENT=testAgent2 HC_N3H_BOOTSTRAP_NODE=wss://192.168.0.2:44057/?a=HcSciVXUA9wTceq4wtJIwyUFWmgb6mc8v76uaMcBaOYhj6dzrQ5Z9brdO9bamya HC_N3H_IPC_URI=wss://127.0.0.1:38059/ hc run --logging --port 3100
